== Password recovery options for Ubuntu ==
 {o} Password Hint - A Hint (text , picture , or multimedia ) in case of forgotten password ; Can be even password itself. <<BR>> 
 {o} Password recovery Disk / hardware - A media containing the encrypted key file . <<BR>> 
 {o} Password recovery through web - Provide a screen to loin to a web server , where the informations are kept . <<BR>> 
 {o} Password recovery email - sends the password /password hint to the users email , which was configured during installation .  <<BR>>
